pages.title: Final Fractal
pages.text: $(li)The Final Fractal is the third strongest sword.$(br)$(li)This weapon will give you the $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/soulsteal)Soulsteal$(/l) I effect while you are carrying in your hand.

pages.name: Final Fractal
pages.text: This weapon doesn't have durability and can't be burned by lava or fire.
